attributes.action: ban the sale of fireworks to the general public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fireworks should only be made available to responsible organisers of official displays. There are too many gangs of teenagers going around causing nuisance and endangering the public with fireworks. You should also have to have an explosives licence in order to obtain fireworks for official displays.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
